A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Firstly\, there was too much forced humour that did not work for me\, especially at what were supposed to be serious points in the film. Previous star wars films have managed to be funny without trying to ram as many slapstick gags in as possible.\nNext they butchered Luke Skywalkers entire character\, this was not the same hero from the original trilogy. Also killing off the last of the jedi order is pretty ridiculous\, and Rey is not trained enough to be considered a jedi.\nThe chase scene through the casino could have just been cut from the film completely\, was a waste of time\, should have used that time to focus on Luke training Rey
